service.fromClickToDoor: From click to your door: we simplify the entire international shopping process with our integrated solution that takes care of every detail.
service.successfulClients: We have already helped over 10,000 clients to import successfully
service.buyProductsDesc: Buy any item from anywhere in the WORLD in a simple and secure way. We use advanced technology to find the best prices and make your purchases quickly and safely.
service.warehouseShippingDesc: Buy from different sellers and we consolidate your orders efficiently. Our consolidation strategy means fewer fees and less risk of loss during international shipping.
service.qualityAssuranceDesc: Our specialized team performs a thorough inspection of each product. We check for defects, size and color, and ensure that you receive exactly what you ordered, avoiding unpleasant surprises.
service.economicalShippingDesc: Save up to 70% on international shipping with our consolidated shipping solution. Our strategic logistics partners guarantee the best cost-benefit ratio on all deliveries, without sacrificing security.

coverageMap.title: Global Coverage
coverageMap.infoDescription: Our global network of distribution centers allows you to shop in over 16 countries worldwide, with personalized services for each region.
coverageMap.infoFooter: Click on the map markers to see specific details for each location. All centers operate 24/7 with real-time tracking.

contact.title: Still have questions?
contact.description: We’re here to help! Contact our customer support team.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to the most common questions about our plans and services.

items.faq1Question: Is a subscription required to use ShipGlobal?
items.faq1Answer: No, our basic plan is completely free. You can use our services at no additional cost, but paid plans offer exclusive benefits and significant discounts.
items.faq2Question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
items.faq2Answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time with no additional fees. Access to benefits will continue until the end of the paid period.
items.faq3Answer: We accept credit cards, debit cards, PayPal, Pix, and bank slips for payments in Brazil. For other countries, we accept international cards and PayPal.
items.faq4Question: How does the shipping discount work?
items.faq4Answer: Discounts are automatically applied at checkout when you’re logged into your account with an active subscription. The discount is calculated on the total shipping cost.
items.faq5Question: Can I change my plan after subscribing?
items.faq5Answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately, with proportional adjustments to the cost.

cta.title: Start your global journey today!
cta.description: Join thousands of satisfied customers who have already unlocked the power of international shopping with ShipGlobal.

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.subtitle: See what our customers are saying about our international shopping platform

anaSilva.name: Ana Silva
anaSilva.text: Excellent service! I was able to buy products from the USA with ease and security. Deliveries are always on time and the support is attentive.

pedroSantos.name: Pedro Santos
pedroSantos.text: Package consolidation saved a lot on shipping. Highly recommend! I never had issues with taxes or delivery delays.

mariaCosta.name: Maria Costa
mariaCosta.text: Exceptional service and delivery within the promised time. Real-time tracking gave me a lot of peace of mind.

carlosMendes.name: Carlos Mendes
carlosMendes.text: I've used several forwarding services, but this one surpasses all in quality and price. Extremely satisfied!

julianaFerreira.name: Juliana Ferreira
julianaFerreira.text: The international purchase process became simple and hassle-free. I recommend it to all my friends.
